Text: When I start the game, windows asks me DOW2.exe?

I also get the following massage when I start the game: Can't find the file DOW2.exe  How do I solve this problem.  I can't find the file anywhere in the installed directory.  Please help.
Here is how you fix the Dow2.exe problem. you have to replace the Cm2 file with the one on the download in the postmortem folder. then you can open it from the actual file directory
the shortcut on the desktop and start menu are bad so youll have to create your own shortcut
